definition: to take part in/to participate/to join/to attend/to counsel/unequal/varied/irregular/uneven/not uniform/abbr. for 參議院|参议院 Senate, Upper House
capacity/quantity/amount/to estimate/abbr. for 量詞|量词[liang4 ci2], classifier (in Chinese grammar)/measure word

sentences.english: Cold-test parameter is the premise of the beam and wave interaction calculation.
sentences.chinese: 行波管的冷參量是電磁波與電子注互作用計算的基礎。

sentences.english: The experimental results on parameters of the pressure and the angle between pump and seed beams are then presented.
sentences.chinese: 並給出斜泵浦拉曼放大下氣壓和角度參量的實驗結果。

sentences.english: Experiment analysis of correlated color temperature and distribution temperature of the source;
sentences.chinese: 顏色溫度和相關色溫是光源的重要參量。

sentences.english: Optical flux is an important parameter of polarization interference spectrometer.
sentences.chinese: 光通量是偏振干涉成像光譜儀的關鍵參量之一。

sentences.english: The dependence of the gain behavior of the system on Rabi frequency of the driving field and other parameters is also illustrated and analyzed.
sentences.chinese: 圖示並分析了系統增益對驅動場和其他參量的依賴性。

sentences.english: The property of viscoelastic interface fracture and the calculating method of fracture parameter are investigated.
sentences.chinese: 研究了粘彈性界面斷裂的性質和斷裂參量的計算方法。

sentences.english: Through scaling transform, field F and energy level E are replaced by parameter t.
sentences.chinese: 通過標度變換，引入t參量代替能級E和外電場F。

sentences.english: The parameters of equivalent four? terminal networks of the single cosine type ultrasonic horn are derived.
sentences.chinese: 推導出餘弦形單一超聲變幅杆的等效四端網絡參量。

sentences.english: Two, the arguments or parameters, and three, is the return value.
sentences.chinese: 第二個，參數和參量，還有三，是那個返回值。

sentences.english: The behaviour of passively Q-switched solid-state lasers containing intracavity optical parametric oscillators(OPOs) is described in detail.
sentences.chinese: 理論分析了被動調Q固體激光泵浦的光參量振盪器。

sentences.english: An argument or a parameter is an input to a function.
sentences.chinese: 參數或參量是一個函數的輸入。

sentences.english: The measurement function was established by defining single parameter unascertained measurement matrix.
sentences.chinese: 定義參量未確知測度矩陣，確定各測度函數。

sentences.english: The dependence of the gain behavior of the system on Rabi frequency of the driving field and other parameters is also illustrated and anal…
sentences.chinese: 圖示並分析了系統增益對驅動場和其他參量的依賴性。

sentences.english: Blackness is an important parameter in the radiometry.
sentences.chinese: 黑度是輻射學中的重要參量。

sentences.english: In recent two years, the measure of those parameters have had new progress.
sentences.chinese: 近兩年裏，這些基本參量的測定有了突破性的進展。

sentences.english: The draw-out-time is one of the most important ballistic parameters of the low-drag parachute bomb.
sentences.chinese: 減速傘拉直時間是描述低空低阻傘彈道特重要要參量。
